last_episode_to_air.name: This Has Been Such An Amazing Experience
last_episode_to_air.overview: Wendy of the Rich Dicks decides to get a bris so he can convert to Judaism; PubLIZity plans Wendy's elaborate Bris Mitzvah; the Too Much Tuna guys pull an amazing final prank.

name: Kroll Show
overview: Kroll Show is an American sketch comedy television series created by and starring comedian Nick Kroll.

episodes.name: San Diego Diet
episodes.overview: Ref Jeff tries to lock down plans; Liz and Liz throw a benefit for canine cancer; students shun a new kid.

episodes.name: Soaked in Success
episodes.overview: Rich Dicks go to Mexico; Dr. Armond gets a spin-off show; successful moments are celebrated in traditional football-fashion.

episodes.name: Secret Room
episodes.overview: Bobby Bottleservice investigates paranormal activity, a couple builds a secret room, and Young Billy Joel goes on an adventure.

episodes.name: Too Much Tuna
episodes.overview: Liz and Liz promote yogurt water; Rich Dicks go shopping; Oh Hello's Gil & George play a prank.

episodes.name: Can I Finish?
episodes.overview: A look into the lives of men with ponytails; Fabrice Fabrice on the streets; Dr. Armond is newly single and ready for love.

episodes.name: Dine & Dash
episodes.overview: Roman gets his spin-off show; Nick explores Dining and Dashing; Oh Hello's Gil & George play basketball, which leads to a serious injury.

episodes.name: Ice Dating
episodes.overview: Pretty Liz and C-Czar fall in love on Ice Dating; Rich Dicks crash their car; radio host El Chupacabra talks a rock star out of suicide.

episodes.name: Please God
episodes.overview: Bobby Bottleservice starts a new venture; Liz and Liz clash when Liz gets married; Ref Jeff runs a bounce house business.

episodes.name: Cake Train
episodes.overview: C-Czar enrolls in Dad Academy; Pretty Liz's pregnancy creates tension on PubLizity; another unsuspecting victim is pranked with Too Much Tuna.

episodes.name: canadiansafesex
episodes.overview: Mikey considers losing his virginity; Tunes goes into labor; Bobby Bottleservice becomes an unenthusiastic gigolo.

episodes.name: Oh Armond
episodes.overview: Armond is under house arrest for his wife's murder; Rich Dicks must deliver the eulogy at Grandpa Goobie's funeral or risk losing their inheritance; geologist R. Schrift explains rocks.

episodes.name: Sponsored by Stamps
episodes.overview: 80s rocker Nash Rickey tries to get the band back together; Ref Jeff finally finds a friend; the Wheels Ontario kids visit the USA.

episodes.name: Krolling Around With Nick Clown
episodes.overview: Nash Rickey advertises his deli; Ref Jeff works for the TSA; European Man pitches his business to investors on Signing Bonus.

episodes.name: Mother Daughter Sister Wife
episodes.overview: The Oh Hello guys cause trouble at the Y; C-Czar cares for a practice baby on Dad Academy; Bobby Bottleservice moves into Gigolo House.

episodes.name: Finger Magnets
episodes.overview: Rich Dicks join an underground rebel group to try to take down Wendy's dad's bank; PubLizity's assistant gets her own reality show; young Larry Bird competes in a two-point shootout.

episodes.name: Mercury Poisoning
episodes.overview: The Oh Hello guys try to prank each other; Rich Dicks are forced to fly coach; two Pennsylvania pawn shop owners switch shops.

episodes.name: Bounce
episodes.overview: Bobby Bottleservice helps Farley record her single; C-Czar reconnects with his long-lost mother; the Armond murder trial gets underway.

episodes.name: Banff Is on Fire
episodes.overview: Armond moves in with his taxidermist father; Bobby Bottleservice confronts a cheater; a shocking accident will change Wheels Ontario forever.

episodes.name: Blisteritos Presents Dad Academy Graduation Congraduritos Red Carpet Viewing Party
episodes.overview: PubLizity promotes Blisteritos with a celebrity-studded carpet event; C-Czar graduates from Dad Academy; Rich Dicks throw a party.

episodes.name: Gigolo H-O-R-S-E
episodes.overview: Bobby Bottleservice plays an elaborate game of H-O-R-S-E with his fellow gigolos; Mikey gets addicted to pills on Wheels, Ontario.

episodes.name: Pleep Ploop
episodes.overview: The Too Much Tuna guys prank a doctor and leave New York; "Show Us Your Songs"; Dr. Armond meets potential companions.

episodes.name: Bangs
episodes.overview: PubLIZity's Liz leaves town to grow out her bangs and joins a team of gold miners in the mountains; the Too Much Tuna guys hit the road and prank a trucker; Wendy accidentally dies after the Rich Dicks try flatlining.

episodes.name: Karaoke Bullies
episodes.overview: The Pawnsylvania crew travels to Maryland for Murph's wedding where Don is upset when he isn't asked to be the best man; Nash Rickey takes a stand against the Karaoke Bullies with the help of Liz's niece Denise.

episodes.name: The In Addition Tos
episodes.overview: Bobby Bottleservice directs an action movie in which he must rescue his mother from Eagle Wing, C-Czar goes on a date with a coworker despite his feelings for Pretty Liz, and Mikey questions his sexuality on "Wheels, Ontario."

episodes.name: Lizards vs. Penguins
episodes.overview: PubLIZity plans a party for the Illuminati; the European offers to help an underground organization take the Illuminati down; Fabrice Fabrice hosts a game show called Crab Cab.

episodes.name: Twins
episodes.overview: Tunes is arrested for detonating a locker bomb in Wheels, Ontario; Farley gives lawyer Ruth Diamond Phillips a makeover; Bobby Bottleservice decides to rebrand himself and become a country star.

episodes.name: The Commonwealth Games
episodes.overview: Show Us Your Songs travels all over the British Commonwealth searching for talent; Bryan La Croix has a huge fight with Gene Creemers; Murph's gambling lands him problems in Pittsburgh.

episodes.name: Body Bouncers
episodes.overview: The Rich Dicks open a restaurant called Dunch; Ruth Diamond Phillips is attracted to her new client Ref Jeff; Bobby Bottleservice enters his own body to bounce Farley from his heart.

episodes.name: The Time of My Life
episodes.overview: Dr. Armond goes to Europe to chase his wife's killer and makes a discovery on "Show Us Your Songs." Also: C-Czar and Bob Ducca meet with PubLIZity to pitch their new invention.

episodes.name: This Has Been Such An Amazing Experience
episodes.overview: Wendy of the Rich Dicks decides to get a bris so he can convert to Judaism; PubLIZity plans Wendy's elaborate Bris Mitzvah; the Too Much Tuna guys pull an amazing final prank.
